author: Ashley Collman
title: Oklahoma's GOP plans to reopen the state starting Friday, despite opposition from doctors and Democrats who say it's way too soon
description:
• Oklahoma Gov. Kevin Stitt announced plans to start reopening the state on Friday, starting with personal care businesses like hair salons and nail salons.
  • It's the fourth state to announce reopening plans, following Florida, Georgia, and Sou…
content:
Oklahoma has become the fourth state to announce plans to re-open its economy, but some say the decision is premature in a week when the state saw a spike in new cases.
The plan will start with businesses like hair salons and pet groomers reopening first on … [+2726 chars]
